backend/main.mo: Defines data types and maps for mantras, translations, metadata, and audio, and exposes query functions to fetch mantra numbers, text, meaning, and metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Describes evidence for a UI feature update involving repositioning the audio section and lists affected file(s) and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files including hooks, components, styles, and configs.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing Veda/Mantra/Language selection, deep-link handling, data fetching, and rendering of metadata, text, audio, and meaning sections.
frontend/src/components/MantraAudioSecti: Component for displaying, uploading, and managing mantra audio with progress, errors, and playback.
frontend/src/components/MantraMetadataHe: Renders metadata text with styled label emphasis while preserving original content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that manages backend actor creation based on authentication state and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, managing AuthClient creation, identity loading, login state, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch mantra numbers, text, meaning, metadata, and audio from the backend using an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, color variables for light/dark themes, and metadata header component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, theme extensions, color mappings to CSS variables, typography, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata including current feature set, issues, and architectural notes for the Vedic mantra browsing app.
